application_protocol.step_2: Honest Fit Evaluation (Match vs Adaptable vs No Match).
application_protocol.step_4: Write a short, calm, human-sounding cover letter referencing specific projects.

meta.note_for_ai: When generating cover letters, mention that some project links are hosted on free/limited tiers (like Railway/Netlify) and may have cold-start delays or temporary downtime.

identity.tagline: Turning complex problems into efficient WebApps, Distributed Systems, and AI solutions.
identity.summary: Full-stack developer with 4+ years of experience specializing in the MERN stack and AI-powered solutions. Unique background combining a BSc in Software Engineering with an ongoing Marketing Management degree, bridging the gap between technical architecture and business value. Proven track record in launching community-focused startups and delivering national-scale digital identity and healthcare systems.

education.note: Adding business and marketing perspectives to technical solutions.

experience.description: Leading a software development startup focused on high-stakes enterprise systems and AI-driven SaaS solutions. Overseeing the full lifecycle from requirements engineering to commercial deployment.
key_impact: Architected a production-grade, offline-first Smart Library Management System featuring commit-based synchronization and device-bound authentication.
Engineered a multi-tenant isolation model (one institution, one database) to ensure long-term maintainability and data security.
Scaled company operations to secure 10+ cross-industry clients while managing a team of 5 developers.
Developed a commercial deployment strategy including branding isolation for dual-market products (Otona St. Mary & Fayda Smart Library).

experience.description: Designed and deployed an intelligent academic analysis platform using Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) and automated AI workflows.
key_impact: Developed a robust plagiarism detection engine using SentenceTransformers and semantic similarity search.
Integrated Friendli AI for structured academic summarization, providing real-time feedback to users.
Architected automated n8n workflows for real-time notifications and assignment evaluation pipelines.
Implemented background retry mechanisms and JSON sanitization to ensure 99% pipeline reliability.

experience.description: Contributing to Ethiopia's national digital identity infrastructure by integrating services with the Fayda National ID system.
key_impact: Implemented secure authentication protocols to enable trusted digital services for the 'Digital Ethiopia 2025' initiative.
Optimized backend systems to handle high-concurrency identity verification requests securely.
Collaborated on open-source modules to lower the barrier for third-party national ID integration.

experience.description: Directed the technical development of an AI-powered surveillance SaaS platform for real-time security monitoring.
key_impact: Achieved 95% detection accuracy for an AI-powered intruder surveillance system using Computer Vision.
Containerized the application using Docker to ensure seamless deployment across varied hardware environments.
Built a scalable video processing pipeline capable of managing multiple concurrent IP camera feeds.

experience.description: Leading the creation of Ethiopia's first Electronic Medical Record (EMR) system integrated with National ID.
key_impact: Designed the system architecture for Ethiopia's first unified EMR platform.
Integrated WebRTC to enable telemedicine capabilities within the medical record workflow.
Ensured strict healthcare data management compliance to protect sensitive patient information.

experience.company: Wolayita Zone Science and Information Technology
experience.description: Led the development of the WZSIT-WebApp to centralize regional tech support and maintenance.
key_impact: Successfully delivered a regional support platform on time and within budget through rigorous sprint management.
Integrated real-time video consultation features, reducing the need for physical on-site technical visits.
Managed complex stakeholder requirements from regional government IT directors.

experience.description: Conceptualized and launched a local-first service platform connecting students with university businesses.
key_impact: Scaled platform to 80+ daily visitors within the first two months of operation.
Generated 5,500 ETB in revenue during the initial launch phase.
Gained foundational experience in full-stack engineering and product-market fit.

projects.title: Offline-First Smart Library Management System
projects.sub_brand: Otona St. Mary / Fayda Smart Library
projects.description: A production-grade, local-first system designed for institutions with unreliable connectivity. It features a custom synchronization engine and multi-tenant isolation, deployed commercially for church and school libraries.
key_features: Architected a 'local-first' write model with deferred synchronization to handle 100% offline operations.
Implemented a custom commit-based sync engine to ensure idempotent data transfer between local SQLite and remote Supabase.
Designed institutional data isolation allowing one-institution-one-database deployment.
Integrated device camera APIs for barcode scanning and attendance tracking.
projects.deployment_context: Commercially deployed; demo available upon request to maintain institutional data privacy.

projects.title: Academic Assignment Helper & Plagiarism Detector
projects.description: An AI-driven academic assistant integrating RAG with automated plagiarism detection and submission workflows.
key_features: Built a full RAG pipeline for contextual academic retrieval and summarization.
Engineered a semantic similarity search engine using FAISS and vector embeddings for plagiarism detection.
Created automated feedback loops via n8n, sending dynamic HTML reports to students and instructors.
Implemented JSON sanitization and retry logic for high-reliability AI API consumption.

projects.title: MyFayda eKYC
projects.description: Digital identity solution integrated with the Ethiopian National ID (Fayda) system to provide secure user verification.
key_features: Integrated directly with national ID infrastructure for verified identity claims.
Built a secure, scalable authentication gateway serving thousands of users.
Ensured compliance with national digital identity standards.

projects.title: MedHub Ethiopia
projects.description: Ethiopia's first Electronic Medical Record (EMR) system with National ID integration and telemedicine capabilities.
key_features: Standardized medical record management for regional healthcare providers.
Implemented peer-to-peer telemedicine consultations using WebRTC.
Integrated national ID verification for patient record accuracy.
projects.deployment_context: Hosted on Railway; link may experience cold-start delays.

projects.title: Wa-Leba & Wa-Leba+
projects.description: AI-driven surveillance SaaS platform that transforms IP cameras into smart security tools.
key_features: Developed intruder detection and customer counting algorithms with 95% accuracy.
Built a scalable video pipeline to process multiple concurrent camera streams.
Containerized core AI services using Docker for environment-agnostic deployment.

projects.title: WZSIT Web-App
projects.description: A comprehensive digital platform for regional tech support, maintenance, and consultations.
key_features: Integrated real-time video support for remote technical assistance.
Built a custom appointment scheduling system with automated notifications.
Managed stakeholder engagement for regional government offices.
projects.deployment_context: Link may experience cold-start delays on free-tier hosting.

projects.title: St. Mary Finance Management System
projects.description: Cloud-based accounting and audit platform for church parish financial operations.
key_features: Automated financial reporting, reducing manual audit work by 80%.
Designed real-time data visualization dashboards for financial transparency.
Implemented role-based access control for sensitive financial data.

projects.title: Offline Book Store App
projects.description: A local-first mobile resource library for software engineering students.
key_features: Curated and indexed 100+ academic resources for offline mobile access.
Optimized file storage for large PDF/document handling on low-end devices.

testimonials.quote: The Wolayita Zone Science and Information Technology Web-App has greatly improved our tech maintenance processes. The system is user-friendly and has simplified our work significantly. A fantastic job by an incredibly talented developer!
testimonials.author: Mr. Netsanet
testimonials.company: Wolayita Zone Science and IT Office

testimonials.quote: The St. Mary Finance Management System has transformed how we handle our finances. It's efficient, reliable, and has streamlined everything from accounting to reports. We couldn't be happier with the results!
testimonials.author: Dn. Zenebe

testimonials.quote: Wa-Leba+ has provided us with the peace of mind that our organization is secure. The real-time monitoring is exceptional, and it's easy to use. Truly impressive work!
testimonials.author: Mr. Samuel

testimonials.quote: The Bible Trivia Game has been a wonderful addition to our Sunday school library. The students enjoy it immensely, and it's an interactive way to teach them. It's exactly what we needed!
testimonials.author: Dn. Tigistu

testimonials.quote: The Offline Book Store App has been invaluable for students here, especially with limited internet access. It's efficient, and having all the materials offline has been a huge help. Excellent work!
testimonials.author: Mr. Alemayehu
